doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XV, Episode No. 28, Manhattan Neighborhood Network
Gay USA, Vol. XV, Episode No. 28, Manhattan Neighborhood Network
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, "Friends don't let friends drive drunk."
1. Interview: Christine Quinn, Executive Director of the Gay and Lesbian Anti-Violence Project, discusses updates in the Andrew Cunanan case.
2. Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community.
COMMERCIAL: Lesbian and Gay Public Awareness Project, tells the story of Bobby Griffith
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, National Alliance for Research on Schizophrenia and Depression
4. Entertainment News. Includes Nora Burns discussing nightlife and entertainment-related events that relate to the LGBT community.
5. Footage of gay pride parade in Madison, Wisconsin
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, Earth Share, "It's a connected world."
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, Crime Prevention Coalition and US Department of Justice, "Not one more."
6. Clip of music video for "Cunty" by Kevin Aviance.
